medium: Nylon, silk, viscose, cotton, jute, celanese, metlon
title: Palomino
description: Vertical stripes of various threads, colors. Natural, beige, pink, white warp. Tan, white & metallic copper weft.  Plain weave variation.  Stapled to 8.5x11\" card.  \"H-7\" and \"Palimino-Hand Woven\" written on card. (natural, white, beige, pink, copper metallic)
